revised_title: Systematic Approximations for the Interior Problem of General Shell Theory
tldr: The author presents a method for obtaining systematic approximations for the interior problem of general shell theory from the three-dimensional equations of infinitesimal elasticity. The method focuses on major terms in these approximations and can be used to derive a consistent first approximation in shell theory, which may serve as a basis for further systematic approximations if needed.
